body.name: 4MP Indoor Security Camera Pet with Phone App 2K 5GHz & 2.4GHz 360°Wireless WiFi Cameras for Baby/Elder/Dog/Pet Motion Detection Audible Alarm Easy Installation Compatible Alexa 1Pcs 64GB SD (2pcs)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 17 mins
features: This surveillance camera features 4 megapixel high definition and intelligent infrared night vision. It offers greater clarity than 1080P, ensuring you experience clearer night vision. It ensures a high-quality view of your house in both low light and total darkness.

In addition to its simple installation process, our security camera also comes equipped with a 64GB memory card. This means you can record high-quality video footage for extended periods without having to worry about running out of storage space. With our camera, you can rest assured that all of your valuable recordings will be safely stored and easily accessible whenever you need them.

An indoor security camera is an essential tool for monitoring your home or office, and we have just the right product for you. Our indoor camera is designed to provide you with peace of mind by detecting any motion that occurs, and by keeping you informed in real-time with advanced motion detection and tracking features. Protect your property and keep it safe with our high-quality indoor camera.

Two-way audio and alarm systemSurveillance camera allows you to communicate with family/pets and visitors, and set up an alarm via microphone and speakers to alert them to the arrival of uninvited guests

In addition to our cloud storage, we also offer exceptional post-sale support. Our dedicated customer service team is available 24 hours a day, seven days a week, to answer any questions or concerns you may have. Whether you need help setting up your camera, troubleshooting an issue, or just want to learn more about your product, we're always here to help. With our knowledgeable and friendly team, you're in good hands.
body.description: 4MP Indoor Security Camera Pet Camera with Phone App 2K 5GHz & 2.4GHz 360°Wireless WiFi Cameras for Baby/Elder/Dog/Pet Motion Detection Audible Alarm Easy Installation Compatible with Alexa

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.1 4.1 out of 5 stars 84 ratings 4.1 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good value - operates perfectly
reviews.reviewText: I purchsed this product to keep tabs on my dog when I'm away from home. The camera is simple to set up and connect to Wifi (the whole process took me less than 5 minutes). I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the image (standard/HD/Super-HD) - and it's in color. The view is not a full 360-degree swivel, but the ample camera range more than meets my needs. Very happy I purchased this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product For Price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This camera was exactly what I was looking for without costly me a lot of money. For under $25 it has all the features I need. Very easy to set up. Has lots of custom settings depending on what you’re using it for. Great video and sound quality. Definitely buying more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and reliable camera for construction
reviews.reviewText: I put this one at the job site as my restaurant is under construction. It does the job. It helps me make sure that somebody is there and is working on the project. The quality is good even at night time. The most useful function is the Playback. Sometimes I couldn’t monitor it live I can always go back and check with playback to see what was going on during the time I didn’t monitor. I’m purchasing a few more to capture all the corners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bought twice and both times disappointed.
reviews.reviewText: Worked great at first. Then one camera started saying it couldn't connect to Wifi. (It was the one closest to the router.) Then the second one would disconnect and say it couldn't find the SSID. For both: At night if there was anything too close it would illuminate it and the background would be hazy.The first set did the same thing. I bought the second thinking I had just gotten a "bad batch" but nope..had the same problems as the first set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Misleading title they are not wireless
reviews.reviewText: I honestly bought them for my daughter’s room and for my living room. I think they work pretty well I don’t like how they’re NOT wireless They need to be connected at all times it comes with everything. But video is good. I don’t need them to record so I’m not paying for the recordings. It’s just to check up on them while I’m at work. I love how they turn and I can see the whole room instead of your typical camera that just one picture, I like the sound they’re pretty loud they were very easy to install to my Wi-Fi I like how they zoom in the picture quality is OK they do have a flash which you can manage on the app but nighttime vision is pretty clear as well.Overall, I recommended for basic useI’ll give them a 7/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Could not have been better
reviews.reviewText: All around great little camera. Chrystal clear and easy to set up. Practically plug and play

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not "wireless" if it has to be plugged in to work
reviews.reviewText: The only way this is "wireless" is that it connects to my wifi. Unless I'm doing something wrong which is possible because the booklet that comes with it is pretty vague, it has to be plugged in to an outlet to work. There is no apparent on/off switch. But once connected, it seems to work quite well. Not sure if I'm going to keep it though, since I'm looking for an actual wireless camera I can charge, then set anywhere. But the video quality seems high viewed through the app. Can't tell where the SD card is or how to read it or replace it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like this camera; I receive alerts when there is motion and I can talk to my visitors when I am away. It works really great!
